hook.name: save_creature
hook.doc: Called whenever a Creature is saved to disk. Additional properties may be saved to the writer.

hook.name: creature_heartbeat
hook.doc: Called once per heartbeat for every Creature.

hook.name: save_entity
hook.doc: Called whenever any Entity is saved to disk. Additional properties may be saved to the writer.

hook.name: save_portal
hook.doc: Called whenever a Portal is saved to disk. Additional properties may be saved to the writer.

hook.name: ready
hook.doc: This hook is called once when the engine first initialized and the game is ready to begin.

hook.name: change_hour
hook.doc: Called every time the in-game hour increments.

hook.name: save_npc
hook.doc: Called whenever an Npc is saved to disk. Additional properties may be saved to the writer.

hook.name: npc_death
hook.doc: This hook is called whenever any Npc dies.

hook.name: npc_heartbeat
hook.doc: Called once per heartbeat for every Npc.

hook.name: save_object_blueprint
hook.doc: Called whenever an ObjectBlueprint is saved to disk. Additional properties may be saved to the writer.

hook.name: save_object
hook.doc: Called whenever an Object is saved to disk. Additional properties may be saved to the writer.

hook.name: object_heartbeat
hook.doc: Called once per heartbeat for every Object.

hook.name: save_player
hook.doc: Called whenever a Player is saved to disk. Additional properties may be saved to the writer.

hook.name: player_start
hook.doc: Invoked when a player first logins in. A primary use of this hook is to set a starting Room for the player.

hook.name: create_creature
hook.doc: Invoked when a user attempts to create a new creature. The hook should begin a creature creation process.

hook.name: player_death
hook.doc: Invoked whenever a Player dies.

hook.name: player_heartbeat
hook.doc: Called once per heartbeat for every Player.

hook.name: save_room
hook.doc: Called whenever a Room is saved to disk. Additional properties may be saved to the writer.

hook.name: room_heartbeat
hook.doc: Called once per heartbeat for every Room.

hook.name: show_room
hook.doc: Invoked whenever a room description is displayed to a creature. This hook is called just after the description display, and may be used to display additional information about a room.

hook.name: save_zone
hook.doc: Called whenever a Zone is saved to disk. Additional properties may be saved to the writer.
